title: How to Paint the Backyard Snow

steps.headline: Gather the items needed.
steps.description: These are listed below under "Things You'll Need".

steps.headline: Fill each spray bottle with water.
Add drops of each shade of food coloring to a different bottle.
steps.description: If you've mixed some colors together, be sure to use a different bottle for those too.

steps.headline: Prepare your kids.
steps.description: Make sure they're properly dressed to go outdoors and send them forth. They might also like it if you help carry some of the bottles.

steps.headline: Choose a suitable place to paint.
steps.description: Set the bottles down in front of it. Let your kids explore their creativity by spraying the snow different colors. The snow is their canvas and this can entertain them immensely.

steps.headline: Take photos of your kids having fun.
steps.description: The colorful snow will look lovely as a backdrop.
